short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Witness Yoriichi Tsugikuni's serene strength before a temple, sword in hand, bathed in red tones.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embrace the legacy of Yoriichi Tsugikuni with a powerful and timeless theme!

🎨 Minimalist Design: Featuring Yoriichi Tsugikuni standing in profile before a temple, gripping his sword with poise, surrounded by striking red tones symbolizing his unmatched strength and resolve.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay grounded with a display inspired by the serene and disciplined world of Demon Slayer.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites with the precision and mastery of Yoriichi.
🎮 Play Games: Engage in sword-fighting mini-games that echo the legendary skills of the first Demon Slayer.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and seamless searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Amplify your browsing experience with features as refined and powerful as Yoriichi’s blade.
